commit message: Moved cover art settings to their own submenu

Added support for multiple urls for cover art.
Added future support for local cover art
Added a non working local cover art provider
Cover art providers now have a name
Multiple cover art providers are now supported
Cover helper can now read from local FS
Cached cover now checks if file exists before returning it to the helper
Covers are now saved into cache if enabled

Tweaked cover storage quality a little

Cache now uses less SD Card space
Local covert art can now search multiple filenames
Added filename support for cover art (closes #170)
Notification now has buttons on jelly bean (Closes #151)
Cover art size is now correct on every android device
Added xhdpi and black and white mpdroid app icons
Black and white notification icon on 2.3+
Fixed url encoding for local cover art download

improved cover art download and caching

Issue #184 - Add an option to disable cover art download on 3G
I've added checkbox 'Download cover art only on wifi' in cover settings.
It works exactly as it should. After switching covers wouldn't be loaded through 3G, only through wifi and from cache.
